/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The vantage point is high, providing a bird's eye view of the urban landscape. The street, lined with trees and buildings, stretches out into the distance, flanked by cars parked neatly on either side. The buildings, predominantly white and gray, rise majestically against the backdrop of a clear blue sky. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the scene. The image is taken from a low angle, adding a sense of depth and perspective to the view. The colors are vibrant, with the green of the trees contrasting beautifully with the blue of the sky and the gray of the buildings.
